bibl.title: Notes from Carthage.
bibl.note: Notes on unpublished lead curse tablets, all Roman Imperial in date, housed in the Musée National de Carthage. - See p. 122: 5. Aliquid novi. Latin tablet folded into a small rectangular packet. Within the folds was a rather flat rectangular papyrus packet, which remains unopened.
bibl.seg: JORDAN David R., Notes from Carthage.

Notes on unpublished lead curse tablets, all Roman Imperial in date, housed in the Musée National de Carthage. - See p. 122: 5. Aliquid novi. Latin tablet folded into a small rectangular packet. Within the folds was a rather flat rectangular papyrus packet, which remains unopened.
